entry.title: RISC-V tools setup
entry.content:
ABlog v0.1 is released.

This is the very first release, so there are no release notes in this post.

Yes, this page is also a post and it resides in a folder different from most other posts in this blogumentation.

The idea is to enable making any page in a Sphinx project a post so that users of a software package can subscribe to feeds and follow new releases as well as code examples added to the documentation.

entry.title: PyGears tools setup
entry.content: If I want to approach this project the TDD way, I need to be ready to test the design from the start. Hence, I will start by obtaining the “golden design”, “reference model” or the “test oracle”, depending on the terminology.
